name: api-login-rest
description: REST API for login with service/controller/repository patterns

scripts.test:reports: npm run test:reports:clean && npm run test:reports:generate && npm run test:reports:merge
scripts.test:reports:generate: NODE_ENV=test npm run test:coverage && NODE_ENV=test mocha tests/unit/**/*.test.js --recursive --timeout 5000 --exit --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports/unit,reportFilename=unit-tests,html=true,json=true && NODE_ENV=test mocha tests/integration/**/*.test.js --recursive --timeout 5000 --exit --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports/integration,reportFilename=integration-tests,html=true,json=true && NODE_ENV=test mocha tests/external/**/*.test.js --recursive --timeout 5000 --exit --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports/e2e,reportFilename=e2e-tests,html=true,json=true
scripts.test:reports:merge: cp -r coverage reports/ && echo 'Reports generated in ./reports directory'
